Booking.title: Booking
Booking.description: Represents a booking made by a customer for a transient accommodation.

startDate.description: The start date of the booking as an ISO string.

endDate.description: The end date of the booking as an ISO string.

numberOfGuests.description: The number of guests for the booking.

guestNames.description: The names of the guests for the booking.

paymentMethod.description: The method of payment used for the booking (GCash or Cash).

paymentStatus.description: The status of the payment (Pending, Paid via GCash, Cash on Arrival, Cancelled).

bookingStatus.description: The status of the booking (pending, confirmed, cancelled).

bookingDate.description: The date the booking was created

isFraudulent.description: Whether the booking is flagged as potentially fraudulent.

fraudulentReason.description: The reason for the fraud flag.

updatedAt.description: Firestore server timestamp of last update.

definition.description: Stores all booking data for the application.

params.name: bookingId
params.description: The unique identifier for the booking.
